## Extension.extensionData() method

Each extension can make extension data available which is updated on each render. Think of it like the prosemirror plugins state.

Within React this data is passed back into Remirror render prop and also the Remirror context and can be retrieved with a `hook` or `HOC`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
extensionData?(params: ExtensionManagerTypeParams<GType>): PlainObject;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>ExtensionManagerTypeParams&lt;GType&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`PlainObject`
